about_the_game:
Go back to Texas and enjoy the super sexy soundtrack that features in the game! Remind yourself of old good times and watch how listening to these tracks will make you the PLAYER OF THE YEAR!

Take your time and further enjoy the art of "King of Texas" by getting your hands on the Official King of Texas Art Book, featuring sprite art, background art, desktop posters and exclusive character bios! Bring your Texas experience to the next level!

All tracks composed and produced by celebrated Swedish producer DJ Twili(kn)ight.
01 - Welcome to Texas
02 - A New Life in Dallas
03 - Cowgirl? COWBELL!
04 - They Call Him Bega
05 - Dallas Arboretum
06 - Lukather Does Anime
07 - Dallas Nightlife
08 - Transferred

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Texas Soundtrack and Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
